name: Tokyo 42
description: Tokyo 42 is a hyper-stylish isometric open-world shooter. Framed for a murder you didn't commit, you'll delve into a world of assassins, deadly corporate intrigue and cats. Explore this beautifully hand-crafted micro Tokyo and discover its secrets.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 Processor: Intel i3-3220 or AMD FX-4100 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GTX 560 or AMD 7850 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Processor: Intel i5-3570 or AMD FX-8120 Graphics: nVidia GTX 960 or AMD R9 290
